name: Carbogen Amcis - Cholesterol NF
description: Carbogen Amcis supplies pharmaceutical-grade Cholesterol NF for cosmetic and pharmaceutical applications. Cholesterol serves as an excellent emulsifying agent and moisturizer in skin conditioning cosmetics. Their cGMP-certified cholesterol ensures the highest quality standards for barrier repair formulations. Multiple grades available including Cholesterol HP (High Purity) for liposomal formulations.
notes: cGMP certification ensures pharmaceutical-grade quality. High-purity cholesterol (Cholesterol HP) is specifically designed for liposomal formulations. Multiple grades available for pharma, cosmetic, and nutritional applications. Excellent choice for premium barrier repair formulations requiring highest quality standards.
